title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.3 - Employers and employees subject to regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.3 - Employers and employees subject to regulation

State Regulations

Any person who employs a person included in the "deep-sea"
register to perform work in his registered capacity and any person included in
the "deep-sea" register are subject to the provisions of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
